text: Hi there, i am trying to create email which can display the store address from the hubdb. Instead of displaying one specific wanted address, it display every address in the database. I have contact property which display which store they are assign to and trying to use that to pull address from hubdb. Do you guys have any idea on how to display only the address assign to the specific store in the hubdb?

Hi community,
I'm developing an email module and I added a rich text in the fields.json but it's not editable in the UI D&D
Only appears the label in the UI
ok, I removed enabled_features  and it showed up
